meanings.sent1: She played with colorful globes in the park.
meanings.sent2: The glass globes on the chandelier sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted the globes around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like bright globes, full of wonder and curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The globes in the shop window caught the attention of passersby.

meanings.definition: A representation of the earth or celestial bodies
meanings.sent1: The classroom had globes showing different countries.
meanings.sent2: He studied the globes to learn about the planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The globes in the museum seemed to have a secret conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a globe, spinning with thoughts of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The globes in the observatory made the night sky feel closer.

meanings.sent1: The cake was decorated with sugary globes.
meanings.sent2: The snowman's head was a perfect globe of snow.
meanings.sent3: The globes of fruit on the tree looked like ornaments.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, a warm globe of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The artist sculpted a marble globe with intricate details.
